Links & More

Below is a list of links to other Bernese Mountain Dog sites and resources:

  • Friends of Nashem Kennels:
  • JendaBernese Mountain Dogs - Jeni and David West
  • Celtic Sapphire Bernese Mountain Dogs - Carol and Roger Arbuthnot
  • Lorien Dell Bernese Mountain Dogs - Lynn and George Wood
  • Sunshine Bernese - Dan & Celia Cuellar
  • Therapet: Animal Assisted Therapy - Shari Curran
  • Bernese Mountain Dog Resources:
  • AKC: The American Kennel Club
  • Bernese Mountain Dog Club of the Rockies (BMDCR) - We are a group of people who love Bernese Mountain Dogs. Our club was founded in October, 1987. It is an official regional club recognized by the national breed club, the Bernese Mountain Dog Club of America. Our membership includes people who are involved in breeding, showing, and all areas of training, as well as those whose Berners are cherished family members.
  • Berner-Garde Foundation - Established to collection, maintain and disseminate information about genetic diseases oberved in the Bernese Mountain Dog.
  • Orthopedic Foundation for Animals (OFA)
